mapper.update: update AF_USER_EXAM_HISTORY set USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXAM_ID = #{examId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUESTION_ID = #{questionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WRONG_RECORD = #{wrongRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTALSCORE = #{totalscore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USEDTIME = #{usedtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where H_ID = #{hId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select H_ID, USER_ID, EXAM_ID, QUESTION_ID, WRONG_RECORD, TOTALSCORE, USEDTIME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from AF_USER_EXAM_HISTORY where H_ID = #{hId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select H_ID, USER_ID, EXAM_ID, QUESTION_ID, WRONG_RECORD, TOTALSCORE, USEDTIME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from AF_USER_EXAM_HISTORY
